New Comp/Circular-2010 
 
// Restricted // 
NO.CAS-8(4)/2009/DIV.I(Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated: 11/01/2010 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 01 / 2010 
 
 
Subject:-  Access of Vehicle upto the aircraft at civil airports in the    
                  country on  protocol /security / medical grounds.  
 
 
Please refer to this Bureau Circular No.36/2005  dated 30.08.2005, on the 
subject mentioned above.  
 
 
02. 
The Governor of Meghalaya may take his vehicle up to apron area during 
his arrival & departure from  LGBI Airport, Guwahati, as a special case.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 ( M. Malaviya, IPS )  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf. 
 
Copy to: 
 
1. MCA ( Shri S.Gowri Shankar, Under Secretary),  
w.r.t MCA letter No.AV.13024/39/2007-SS  dated 29.12.2009 
 
2. Shri Hector Marwein, IAS, Commissioner & Secretary to the Governor of 
Meghalaya.
